body: Ok so fluenza said that staff spotlight is making its return. I want your thoughts on staff spotlight, do you have any specific questions we should ask the staff when its their turn and how could we improve it?
body_tagged: Ok so fluenza said that staff spotlight is making its return. I want your thoughts on staff spotlight, do you have any specific questions we should ask the staff when its their turn and how could we improve it?
title: Staff spotlight is back!!

replies.body:
I think the current format is fine.
It gives us a little insight on whoever does the spotlight which is the point of the whole thing.

I don't know sessp, what do you think?
